query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS clients (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  artisanId INT NOT NULL,
  nom VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  prenom VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(320),
  telephone VARCHAR(20),
  adresse TEXT,
  codePostal VARCHAR(10),
  ville VARCHAR(100),
  notes TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS devis (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  artisanId INT NOT NULL,
  clientId INT NOT NULL,
  numero VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  dateDevis TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  dateValidite TIMESTAMP,
  statut ENUM('brouillon', 'envoye', 'accepte', 'refuse', 'expire') DEFAULT 'brouillon',
  objet TEXT,
  conditionsPaiement TEXT,
  notes TEXT,
  totalHT DECIMAL(10, 2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  totalTVA DECIMAL(10, 2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  totalTTC DECIMAL(10, 2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS interventions (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  artisanId INT NOT NULL,
  clientId INT NOT NULL,
  titre VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  dateDebut TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  dateFin TIMESTAMP,
  statut ENUM('planifiee', 'en_cours', 'terminee', 'annulee') DEFAULT 'planifiee',
  adresse TEXT,
  notes TEXT,
  devisId INT,
  factureId INT,
  technicienId INT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
